Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2009 02:14PM KH1 wrote: Hi Maria!  Best of luck.  I am Her2 + so had Herceptin twice during rads.  I had 28 sessions and was able to work full time.  My usual day was to wake at 0400, leave for the hospital at 0500, rads at 0600, to work by 0630, worked from 0715 - 1515 (as an office mgr), went home and collapsed.  I would have found studying very difficult at the end of the day.  No responsibiiites - my husband changed the litter; I bought groceries, cleaned on the weekend. I had a terrible burn before my 25th rad and was in agony until five days after the 28th.  The severe burn truly surprised me because until then I only felt sorry for myself because I had to get up at 0400!
Posts.Title: side effects of radiation therapy Maria217 Imasurvivor
